text:
If Taimur’s Pics Are Your Guilty Pleasure Then You Just Can't Miss His Nanny’s Parody Account!
If Taimur’s Pics Are Your Guilty Pleasure Then You Just Can't Miss His Nanny’s Parody Account!
If you are reading this article, then it clearly means that you secretly love the adorable star kid Taimur Ali Khan. Come on, we know his cute pictures are your guilty pleasure.
Most of us, even when we don’t want to, are flooded with Tamiur’s pictures on social media, and like every other kid, this adorable goofball leaves us aww-ing for hours.
Twitter
So, last week, the most important news that broke the world of entertainment was that Taimur’s nickname is Tim. He doesn’t like being addressed as Taimur. He would correct you and say “It’s Tim”, instantly, when you do so. If you’re thinking, we are making this up, the video below is a proof.
Saif Ali Khan and Kareena Kapoor’s son Taimur Ali Khan is often spotted with his nanny who is no more indifferent to the media glare. So much so, that several instagram pages are dedicated to her. And this one, called ‘Taimur Ki Nanny’ that we recently discovered is beyond hilarious. The bio is enough to crack you up.
instagram/taimur_ki_nanny
Don't Miss 174 SHARES
Also, we know you’re not asking about it, but let us tell you that that the basic salary of Taimur’s nanny is Rs 1.50 lakh per month, as per the reports. And it can go upto Rs. 1.75 lakhs depending on the extra hours she works.
And this, my friend, is more than the salary of the PM of our nation -- which is 1.60 Lakh, per month, as revealed by an RTI filed in 2012.
outlookindia.com
So, now that you know Taimur’s Nanny, who accompanies Taimur to all foreign locales, is no less than a celebrity, here’s her Instagram fan account that will leave you in splits.
#1
#2
#3
#4
#5
#6
#7
#8
#9
What did you find more fascinating – the fact that Taimur’s nanny has a hilarious unofficial Instagram account or her humongous salary? Tell us in the comments section below.
title: If Taimur’s Pics Are Your Guilty Pleasure Then You Just Can't Miss His Nanny’s Parody Account!
